It's an interesting thing but I think their specific concerns are somewhat overcooked.As another commenter pointed out in the earlier thread: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44721712> The categorisation regulations are a statutory instrument rather than primary legislation, so they _are_ open to judicial review.
